page.title: 15HUNTING,SHOOTING,FISHING
page.content: Some people in Midmar shoot game like hare, rabbit, pheasant and grouse.Many people keep lambs or pigs until they are fat and then they slaughter them for the freezer.Venison is deer and is very nice to eat, like pheasant it is very strong tasting.The deer live in the woods and the farmers shoot them because they eat the crops and the bark of the trees.Scots people like whisky which is distilled near our area.Also a hot toddy must be the most popular drink on a cold night.We get fresh fish from Aberdeen and the trawlers still come into the harbour. Some fishermen go to the Dee or the Don to fish for salmon or small trout.
